Mendose.text: Have you received my letter; no reply received, telegraph

Merulam.text: Received your letter and forwarded it as requested

Mespilum.text: Received your letter, and instructions noted

Metallum.text: Received your letter and returned it to you

Metatio.text: Received your letter and telegram; having attention

Metopion.text: Received your letter and will attend to it immediately

Metreta.text: Received your letter and will attend to it as soon as possible

Metuo.text: Received your letter; attending to contents

Migratio.text: Received your letter; attended to contents and writing

Militia.text: Received your letter, but no enclosures

Milvago.text: Received your letter; cannot do as you wish

Milvinus.text: Received your letter; cannot reply until ---

Minor.text: Received your letter; do not understand ---

Minutal.text: Received your letter; do not understand first portion

Mirmillo.text: Received your letter; do not understand latter portion

Miseria.text: Received your letter; have already sent

Mithrax.text: Received your letter; have replied fully
